alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 10:51PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Judith Basin, northwestern Fergus, southwestern Blaine and southeastern Chouteau Counties through 1130 PM MDT... At 1050 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over northeastern Judith Basin, northwestern Fergus, and southeastern Chouteau Counties, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stanford, Denton, Coffee Creek, Windham, Square Butte, Judith Landing, Iliad and Benchland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Fergus County below 4500ft; Judith Basin County and Judith Gap; Western and Central Chouteau County
